text: Saved by Love is a 1908 American silent movie directed by Edwin S. PorterSAVED BY LOVE and stars Florence Turner, Pat O'Malley, Walter Edwin, and Miriam Nesbitt. ==Actors== *Florence Turner *Pat O'Malley *Walter Edwin *Miriam Nesbitt ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:American movies Category:1908 movies Category:American silent movies
title: Saved by Love (movie)
